title: PSA: Lux Should be your League Role Model

replies.body: I met a friendo semi-recently who literally did this and roleplayed Lux in chat the entire game. It was actually really funny and I friended him afterwards. :)

At correct circumstances, it could actually be perfect trolling.

"Oh, great, 7 minutes in and we already lost bot tower"
**"Stay positive!"**
"Please surr all three lanes lost"
**"We can do this!"**
"Plz Lux stop leaving us just to three-ward the river"
**"I want to see everything"**
"Lux ur support, why build Rabadon"
**"Pushing my limits"**
"Maybe If Lux actually hit one ult once..."
**"Keep believing"**
"Lux, MF why are you in that heavily unwrded part of jungle"
**"Curiosity is going to kill one of us"**
"Lux wtf is that build"
**"A beacon in battle"**
"Shaco plz uninstall ur noob"
"I am not, just bad game, I deserve challenger"
**"Never deny who you are"**
I tried roleplaying as Sion and Leona. Fun experience.

I tried it with {{champion:28}} 


lets just say the IFS system wasn't as enthusiastic as I was
{{champion:89}}  Excuse me sir, do you have a moment to talk about our lord and savior, the sun?

All right, I'll roleplay as Bard from now on.

{{champion:29}} : "Could you stop going after the damn chimes?"
{{champion:432}} : *Aggressive Musical Note* followed by an *ootay~*
I brought Bard recently. It's so hard fighting the urge to go collect the chime at enemy blue.

Don't fight that urge. NEVER fight that urge.

The map is your playground, the walls are mere suggestions, the enemy presence is a half-remembered joke you've long forgotten the punchline to. Those are YOUR chimes, and nothing should ever stop you from collecting them.
https://i.imgur.com/p4psu86.gif[/img] https://i.imgur.com/8HgVCD5.gif[/img] https://i.imgur.com/p4psu86.gif[/img]
As a Bard main, I support the direction this chain of comments took. ;~; <3
{{champion:432}} {{champion:432}} {{champion:432}} {{champion:432}} {{champion:432}} {{champion:432}} {{champion:432}}
You're my new hero.
FeelsBardMan

*After pentakilling the enemy team*

"Would it help if I apologized?"

More like:
{{champion:267}}  come on team theres only one control ward on the map please buy some!
My team : {{champion:81}}  Who needs a map?!?
i've never had a rioter in my games. im curious. what sort of bullshit do you deal with usually when people notice your name?

Usually people are chill and just treat me like a normal Silver scrub. :) 

That being said, these are the most common 'Rioter' things I think I encounter: 

- "What do you do at Riot?" or "What's it like to work for Riot?" (Always happy to answer these Qs)
- "A Rioter! Better be good or she'll instaban you lololol" 
- Requests to nerf/buff different champions 
- "Give me free skins" 
- What I call the 'global taunt' where an enemy team will specifically kill me over and over (which is sometimes like good for winning games because I play a lot of like, Braum haha)

>"What do you do at Riot?" or "What's it like to work for Riot?" (Always happy to answer these Qs)

now that you mention it... what DO you do at riot? :P

i don't wanna know what's it like. i want my imagination to not be ruined or oversaturated :P

>"A Rioter! Better be good or she'll instaban you lololol"

ever actually done that? like... can you do that?

>Requests to nerf/buff different champions

https://media.giphy.com/media/jQmVFypWInKCc/giphy.gif

typical

>"Give me free skins"

{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} 

next time someone asks you should reply with something like "sorry! already have a girlfriend! can't get skins for anyone else! " :P

>What I call the 'global taunt' where an enemy team will specifically kill me over and over (which is sometimes like good for winning games because I play a lot of like, Braum haha)

i wonder what would happen if you played Teemo to boot :P

To answer that first one: 

I'm an Experience Designer on Game Systems. My main projects have included Runes Reforged and the League Friends mobile app, though I've helped out on things like the elemental dragons, the new client, plants and a buncha smaller stuff.

An Experience Designer, or UX Designer, is a bit like an architect - we make visual layouts for where to display information or place buttons, write documents for how systems should work, write copy for error messages or missions, etc. A bit like a cross between art & game design, if that makes sense.

I also love working for Riot. As an Experience Designer, working for a company that cares about players has always been my dream. Also I love that I get to talk to you folks! It actually really helps me in my job, IMO. 

^ That's a longer answer than I would give in game chat for sure. 

PS - I do play Teemo ;)
It's bad, but it's no {{champion:17}} laugh.
sorry but the best/worse laugh is nunu bot
I mean... I just have to listen to that overly positive attitude and I feel poisoned. There's only so much times you can hear "Stay positive" before wanting to drown Lux in a toilet.

"There's no I in team, but there's one in Darius" 
-Let these words of wisdom help you when you start to feel down! {{champion:122}}
https://i.imgur.com/XRrbi3P.png?noreply
I miss Darius. He's complete trash right now {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

Zed speaks the truth.

"Balance is a lie".

{{champion:201}} Stand behind braum
troublemaker toss best game
keep your spirits high
the darker the night, the brighter the stars
Tryndamere! This is fun, right?

I roleplayed as {{champion:33}} for a few games and ONLY said "ok" and its so hard for someone to be too toxic to me. When top complained that i didn't gank, I just replied "ok" and he stopped flaming me the whole game. It was hilarious.
{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}

{{champion:92}} 
COULD YOU POSSIBLY FEED THE EMENY YASUO ANY FURTHER?
{{champion:33}}:ok
https://pics.me.me/0-13-0-52-16-07-job-here-is-done-but-you-didnt-14381909.png

Master Yi teaches you some good lessons for solo queue.

"Do not let your pride blind you."
"Never await victory."
"A true master is an eternal student."

_"I'll torch my enemies."_

_"Ready to get burned?"_

_"So I have a temper. Big deal."_

_"You asked for it!"_

_"No one threatens me!"_

_"Do not make me angry."_

_"Be aggressive!"_

_"Don't make me put down this staff and punch you in the face."_

_"Am I the only one warding?!"_

"AM I THE ONLY ONE WARDING?"
I prefer Veigar as my role model. 100% evil, my dudes.
http://static.tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pub/images/dbzpureevil_7244.png
Pretty sure Lux has chronic depression deep down. The positivity is just a cover.

She has magic though, that's pretty amazing.

That and Galio is her friend-


I don't think it's easy to stay depressed with those two going for her-


.....Actually she has a short story where she ran from home due to some anxiety thing,  rode a horse to the countryside, met galio, accidentally awakened him due to having a lot of magic power, made friends after a few events and then went home happy again.


It's easy to be happy when you have the national protector as your friend, if anyone tries to bully your they will face the equivalent of a moving landslide xD
